name: Darklight (Fridge Raiders)
description:
Darklight is a short roguelike game where you must escape an underground dungeon. 

Collect power ups at the end of each floor to grow stronger and increase your chance of escaping, or skip them to increase your score.

Controls

WSAD - Move

Mouse - Aim

Click -Shoot

Shift - Dodge

Tab - View stats

Made by FridgeRaiders and Rhys Kemmis
